name: Brick Drop Classic
description:
Brick Drop Classic game is a in most brick games with the shapes each consisting of several squares, that are falling down the well.

Seems like it's quite easy to play Brick Drop Classic game, but as levels progress, you feel that playing Brick Drop Classic game may be a real challenge.

FEATURED:
- Great graphics and music
- Classic, challenge and adventure mode.
- Play by button or gesture (slide left, slide right, slide down and touch to rotate blocks).
- Forecast area of blocks.
- Good relax your brain
